    <div class="spacer-40 visible-xs">
    </div>
    <div id="sky-container">
     <div id="sticky-anchor-sky">
     </div>
     <div id="sticky-sky">
      <div id="sky">
      </div>
      <style>
       #sticky-sky.stick {
			margin-top: 0 !important;
			position: fixed;
			top: 53px;
			z-index: 10000001;
		}

		@media (max-width:767px) {
			#sticky-sky.stick {
				top: 56px !important;
			}
		}
      </style>
      <script>
       var IsTimeOver = false;
		function sticky_relocate_sky() {
			var window_top_offset = 0;
			if (window.innerWidth < 768) window_top_offset = 56;
            var window_top = $(window).scrollTop();

				var div_top_sky = $('#sticky-anchor-sky').offset().top - window_top_offset;

            if (window_top > div_top_sky) {
                if (!IsTimeOver) {
                    $('#sticky-sky').addClass('stick');
					$('#sticky-sky').css('width', $('#sticky-anchor-sky').innerWidth());
					$('#sticky-mrec.stick').css('top', $('#sticky-superbanner.stick').height() + 53);
                }
            } else {
                $('#sticky-sky').removeClass('stick');
                if (window.innerWidth > 767) {
					$('#sticky-sky').css('margin-top', '0');
                }
				$('#sticky-sky').css('width', 'initial');
                $('#sticky-anchor-sky').height(0);
			}
		}
      </script>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="inpage">
  </div>
  <script>
   if (fd4ca4c1d6992e1927550be7fb2f6f3da === facda4c6b304b74db6fa08cf13e3da1ce) {
			if (asmiView === "m") {
				var bs_wrapper = $('.bs-wrapper').html();
				$('.bs-wrapper').remove();
				$('.bs-wrapper--mobile').html(bs_wrapper);
				$('#superbanner').attr("id", "banner");
				$('#sky').attr("id", "mrec_btf_3");
				$('#mrec_btf').attr("id", "mrec_btf_2");
				if ($('#m_mrec_btf').length > 0) {
					$('#m_mrec_btf').attr("id", "mrec_btf");
				} else {
					$('#mrec').attr("id", "mrec_btf");
				}
				if ($('#m_mrec').length > 0) {
					$('#m_mrec').attr("id", "mrec");
				} else {
					$('#billboard').attr("id", "mrec");
				}
				if ($('#m_billboard_btf_2').length > 0) {
					$('#m_billboard_btf_2').attr("id", "mrec_btf_5");
				} else {
					$('#billboard_btf_2').attr("id", "mrec_btf_5");
				}
				$('#billboard_btf').attr("id", "mrec_btf_4");
			} else {
				$('#d_mrec').attr("id", "mrec");
				$('#d_billboard_btf_2').attr("id", "billboard_btf_2");
			}


			//ASMI LoadHandler
			sas_loadHandler = function(adSlot) {

				if (window.innerWidth >= 768) {

					if (adSlot.hasAd && adSlot.id === 'mrec') {

						$(window).scroll(sticky_relocate_mrec);
						sticky_relocate_mrec();
						var timermrec = null, interval = 1000, value = 0;
						if (timermrec !== null) return;
						timermrec = setInterval(function() {
							value++;
							if (value > 2) {
								$('#sticky-mrec').removeClass('stick');
								$('#sticky-mrec').attr('id', '');
								$('#sticky-mrec').css('width', 'initial');
								$('#sticky-anchor-mrec').height(0);
								clearInterval(timermrec );
								sticky_relocate_mrec  = function () { return null };
							}
						}, interval);
					}
				}


                if (adSlot.hasAd && adSlot.id === 'superbanner' || adSlot.hasAd && adSlot.id === 'banner') {

					$(window).scroll(sticky_relocate_superbanner);
					sticky_relocate_superbanner();
					var timersuperbanner = null, interval = 1000, value = 0;
					var timer_value = 1;
					if (window.innerWidth < 768) timer_value = 2;
					if (timersuperbanner !== null) return;
					timersuperbanner = setInterval(function() {
                        value++;
                        if (value > timer_value) {
                            if ($('#sticky-superbanner').hasClass('stick')) {
                                $('#sticky-superbanner').slideUp("slow", function () {
	                                $('#sticky-superbanner').slideDown(1, function () { });
									window.IsTimeOver = true;
									$('#sticky-superbanner').removeClass('stick');
									$('#sticky-superbanner').css('margin-top', '0');
                                });
                            }

							window.IsTimeOver = true;
                            clearInterval(timersuperbanner);
                            sticky_relocate_superbanner = function () { return null };
						}
					}, interval);
				}
			};
		}
  </script>
  <script>
   var isDesktopView = true;
		var maxMobileWidth = 768;

		$(document).ready(function () {
			if ($(window).width() < maxMobileWidth) {
				moveToPosition('xs');
				isDesktopView = false;
			}
		});

		$(window).resize(function () {
			if (isDesktopView && $(window).width() < maxMobileWidth) {
				moveToPosition('xs');
				isDesktopView = false;
			} else if (!isDesktopView && $(window).width() >= maxMobileWidth) {
				moveToPosition('lg');
				isDesktopView = true;
			}
		});

		function moveToPosition(pos) {
			$('.responsivePosition').each(function () {
				$(this).insertBefore($("#" + pos + "Position" + this.id));
			});
		}
